these windows were meticulously crafted and showed pictures of saints .

output.sentences: Today we went to a cathedral where we say many beautiful stained glass windows depicting narrative scenes.
Most of the windows told the stories of saints.
Here is St. Francis performing a miracle.
This depicts John the Baptist baptizing Jesus.
The church is designed to evoke the journey from heaven to earth in its architecture.
